title: The Glass Wall (restored, with intro and outro) (1953, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: The Glass Wall (restored, with intro and outro) (1953, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: The Glass Wall is a 1953 American drama film noir directed by Maxwell Shane and starring Vittorio Gassman and Gloria Grahame . The black-and-white film was produced and distributed by Columbia Pictures . The title refers to a design feature of the United Nations headquarters in New York City . It tied with two other films for the 1953 Golden Leopard , the top prize at the Locarno International Film Festival .
